scripts.clear: npm run clear:parcel-cache & npm run clear:builds & npm run clear:node_modules
scripts.prerelease: npm run prerelease:interval-utilities && npm run prerelease:point-utilities && npm run prerelease:suspense
scripts.prerelease:interval-utilities: rm -rf ./.parcel-cache && cd packages/interval-utilities && rm -rf ./dist && npm run build
scripts.prerelease:point-utilities: rm -rf ./.parcel-cache && cd packages/suspense && rm -rf ./dist && npm run build
scripts.prerelease:suspense: rm -rf ./.parcel-cache && cd packages/suspense && rm -rf ./dist && npm run build
